SEARCH
Module flag4j
Package org.flag4j.arrays.backend.ring

Interface RingTensorMixin<T extends RingTensorMixin<T,U,V>,U extends RingTensorMixin<U,U,V>,V extends Ring<V>>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of this tensor.
U - Dense equivalent of this tensor. If this tensor is dense, this should be the same type as T
V - Type of an element of this tensor. Satisfies ring axioms.
All Superinterfaces:
TensorOverRing<T,U,Ring<V>[],V>, TensorOverSemiRing<T,U,Ring<V>[],V>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDenseRingTensor
public interface RingTensorMixin<T extends RingTensorMixin<T,U,V>,U extends RingTensorMixin<U,U,V>,V extends Ring<V>> extends TensorOverRing<T,U,Ring<V>[],V>

This interface provides default functionality for all tensors whose entries are elements of a Ring. This includes both sparse and dense tensors.

The default methods in this interface can be overridden if desired, but it is generally recommended to use them as is.

      default int[] argmin()
      Finds the indices of the minimum value in this tensor.
      Returns:
      The indices of the minimum value in this tensor. If this value occurs multiple times, the indices of the first entry (in row-major ordering) are returned.
